results.content: I like project-based tutorials in general and the instructor for these ones seems to know what he is doing, but I would have preferred to have a greater understanding of the relevant theory and agenda for each project before getting to its implementation.
results.content_html: I like project-based tutorials in general and the instructor for these ones seems to know what he is doing, but I would have preferred to have a greater understanding of the relevant theory and agenda for each project before getting to its implementation.

results.content:
Great course, but is hard to say if the final conclusions are fair, of if they are influenced by the author preferences.

Also, it spend a little much time bootstrapping the apps before start coding for real, and it is booring at times.
results.content_html:
Great course, but is hard to say if the final conclusions are fair, of if they are influenced by the author preferences.

results.content: Simple, quick and easy, helps me decide which study to achieve my goals at the moment.
results.content_html: Simple, quick and easy, helps me decide which study to achieve my goals at the moment.

results.content:
Very Good Course. For me Its Useful. 
Just a Request to the Author , Please add SLIDES , Flow charts and If possible before Start of Every chapter , Show  a demo of what we are Going to see and Build.  The Instructor has a clear Voice and a good presenting skill.
results.content_html:
Very Good Course. For me Its Useful.
Just a Request to the Author , Please add SLIDES , Flow charts and If possible before Start of Every chapter , Show a demo of what we are Going to see and Build. The Instructor has a clear Voice and a good presenting skill.

results.content: Overall good introduction to 3 of the main javascript frameworks.
results.content_html: Overall good introduction to 3 of the main javascript frameworks.
